content: valentine s day is a great time of year to take the time to tell your loved ones that you care crochet patterns with crocheted hearts are the most popular at this time and they make a great gift options crochet projects with heart themes are just unlimited you can crochet any thing right from crochet hats blankets crochet scarf crochet bags crochet baskets or a cute heart amigurumi tiny crochet hearts are great for decorating your gift bags today am sharing the pattern for this super easy and quick crochet blanket with hearts this crochet blanket would be perfect for valentine s day crafting or when you want to make something special for your loved ones the pattern is a one row repeat and very easy and beginner friendly this blanket is made with double crochets and crochet puff stitches these puff stitches resemble tiny hearts hence the name crochet heart blanket this makes it the perfect valentine crochet project so get started now to have them ready in time for the day of love materials used - 8 ply cotton yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 25 inches- customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/mqy1tx6gclo
